column1: Local Foods////The tag line for local foods should be tasty but come after payday. In my experience as a college student local foods is a great place for a lunch date
column3: or any kind of lunch activity. A sandwich with a sides or a soup ( I recommend there chicken pozole it fantastic) will be around 20 dollars. Although
column5: my favorites are the truffle egg sandwich
column6: the garden Sammy or the crunchy chicken. The meal itself is slightly overpriced. I think it's a great place for a special lunch but I wouldn't come here regularly.
